text: @WhiteHouse draft dodger don still trying to act like a military general, calling Covid-19 an enemy he will defeat.  It's a virus, albeit a virulent one, not an enemy. He's supposed to be a president not a pretend military hero.  He cant defeat a virus, you can slow it, vaccinate it
